excerpt: Picturesque beach cove with views of 4 islands, plus a large cross fabled among fishermen.
detail_description: Quatro Ilhas is a stunning beach in Bombinhas, known for its breathtaking views of four islands and a large cross that holds significance among local fishermen. The area is popular among tourists, offering complete infrastructure with bars, restaurants, and kiosks providing public restrooms and accessibility features. During the summer, Quatro Ilhas becomes a hotspot for young people due to its numerous beachfront bars.
name: Quatro Ilhas
address: State of Santa Catarina, 88215-000, Brazil

excerpt: Popular city beach offering swimming & sunbathing, as well as several nearby eateries.
detail_description: Praia de Bombinhas, also known as Praia do Centro, is a popular city beach that attracts sun and sea lovers. It offers all the necessary amenities for a day of sunbathing and swimming in the emerald waters, including nearby restaurants, supermarkets, parking lots, and ice cream shops. Visitors can also rent chairs, stand-up paddle boards, and kayaks to make the most of their beach experience.
name: Praia de Bombinhas
address: Centro, State of Santa Catarina, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Praia de Bombas is the first beach in the municipality of Bombinhas and is known for its excellent infrastructure. It's a favorite due to its spacious main avenue and easy accessibility as it's the first beach on the peninsula. The beachfront features a boardwalk for walking and biking, while the main street offers various options for dining, shopping, and physical activities.
name: Praia de Bombas
address: State of Santa Catarina, 88215-000, Brazil

excerpt: Little beach bordered by hills & rock formations, with scenic views & adjacent eateries.
detail_description: Retiro dos Padres Beach, also known as Praia do Retiro, is a small and secluded beach located in Bombinhas, Santa Catarina. Accessible by car and surrounded by hills and rock formations, this little gem offers scenic views of crystal-clear waters and the Atlantic Forest. The calm sea makes it perfect for swimming and there's even a restaurant right on the beach offering delicious meals with a view.
name: Retiro dos Padres Beach
address: State of Santa Catarina, 88215-000, Brazil

excerpt: This modest, sandy beach on a bay surrounded by green hills features swimming & sunbathing.
detail_description: Praia da Tainha is a secluded sandy beach nestled in a bay surrounded by lush green hills, offering a serene setting for swimming and sunbathing. Accessible via a scenic 44 tour through the remote and mountainous Peninsula area, visitors are treated to unique views of the Zimbros bay, rocky shores, and panoramic vistas of Mariscal.
name: Praia da Tainha
address: State of Santa Catarina, 88215-000, Brazil

excerpt: Popular hiking route to a coastal summit overlooking beaches, islands & multiple city skylines.
detail_description: Morro dos Macacos is a popular hiking destination located in the Parque Municipal do Morro do Macaco. The 1.8 km trail offers stunning views of Bombinhas beach, surrounded by lush nature. It takes about 30-40 minutes to reach the 191-meter summit, with a moderate level of difficulty and steep inclines. Closed-toe shoes are recommended for this well-marked trail, which provides panoramic vistas of beaches, islands, and city skylines.
name: Morro dos Macacos
address: Canto Grande, Bombinhas - State of Santa Catarina, 88215-000, Brazil

excerpt: This unassuming sandy beach in a residential area features swimming, boating & fishing.
detail_description: Canto Grande Beach, located in the municipality of Bombinhas on the north coast of Santa Catarina, is a serene and inviting destination. With its calm and crystalline waters, extensive white sand strip, rocky shores, and native vegetation, it offers an ideal setting for activities such as swimming, boating, fishing, hiking, and diving. The village of Canto Grande has around 800 inhabitants who are mainly fishermen and locals preserving their traditions.
name: Canto Grande Beach
address: Bombinhas - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

detail_description: Eco 360º is a must-visit attraction in Bombinhas, offering panoramic views of the region. Located near important environmental preservation areas, it provides intense contact with nature and opportunities to learn about native fauna and flora at a small museum located at the base of the hill. For adults, a rewarding climb up a trail leads to breathtaking panoramic views of the entire area.
name: Eco 360º
address: Av. Tatuíra, 1500 - Canto Grande, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

excerpt: Calm turquoise water for snorkeling & mountain views are offered at this small, sandy beach.
detail_description: Sepultura is a small, sandy beach with calm turquoise waters perfect for snorkeling and stunning mountain views. The region offers various diving locations with diverse characteristics, catering to both accredited divers and beginners seeking new experiences. Bombinhas and Ilha do Arvoredo provide an excellent combination of diving facilities, accommodations, and exceptional service for an unforgettable diving vacation.
name: Sepultura
address: Bombinhas - State of Santa Catarina, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Praia de Zimbros is a tranquil beach in Bombinhas, offering a peaceful atmosphere for those seeking relaxation. It features less infrastructure but provides various accommodation options, bars, and restaurants. The area is known for its picturesque and unforgettable bucolic landscape. Visitors can enjoy the beautiful scenery and explore the local flora, including an aromatic plant that was abundant in the region and used to mix with gin.
name: Praia de Zimbros
address: Parque Natural Municipal Costeira de Zimbros s/n, Zimbros, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Zimbros Beach is a beautiful stretch of coastline that includes Praia do Cardoso, Praia Vermelha, and Praia Triste. The calm waters make it perfect for children to play in and its vast expanse is great for leisurely walks. Additionally, the area is popular for water sports such as windsurfing, jet skiing, and sailing. It's an ideal spot for both relaxation and outdoor activities.
name: Zimbros
address: Bombinhas - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

detail_description: Praia do Mariscal is a must-visit destination for beach lovers. It's the largest beach in the city, stretching over 4 km and offering both calm waters and good waves for surfing. The clear waters are perfect for snorkeling, with excellent visibility. Praia do Mariscal holds the Blue Flag certification, ensuring its quality. This democratic beach attracts surfers to its left side while providing ample space for relaxation on its wide sandy shores.
name: Praia do Mariscal
address: State of Santa Catarina, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Praia do Cação is a hidden gem that has recently caught the attention of travelers seeking tranquility and natural beauty. Nestled in a secluded area surrounded by lush native vegetation, this petite beach stretches just over 60 meters but offers stunning views and calm, crystal-clear waters perfect for swimming or diving. The serene atmosphere makes it an ideal spot for those looking to escape the crowds and capture beautiful selfies against a backdrop of untouched nature.
name: Praia do Cação
address: Parque Natural Municipal Morro do Macaco s/n, Canto Grande, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Praia da Sepultura in Bombinhas is known for its small but stunning stretch of sand and crystal-clear waters, making it a popular spot for snorkeling and diving to observe various fish species. It's recommended to visit outside peak season for a more tranquil experience. The picturesque cove offers a calm sea with rocks perfect for admiring the natural beauty.
name: Praia da Sepultura
address: R. Garoupas, 826 - Centro, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Praia do Ribeiro is a small, 120-meter-long beach nestled between Bombas and Bombinhas. Surrounded by lush native vegetation, it offers crystal-clear waters ideal for snorkeling enthusiasts. Despite its moderate accessibility, many tourists miss out on this natural beauty. With no infrastructure, it's perfect for those seeking tranquility for swimming and sunbathing. The beach features a mix of sand and rocks, adding to its picturesque charm.
name: Praia do Ribeiro
address: Acesso pela Passarela do Ribeiro, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Nestled alongside the stunning Praia de Bombinhas, Praia do Embrulho is a charming little beach that offers visitors a delightful escape. With its picturesque views of the Bay of Pumps and an array of boats bobbing in the water, it’s a perfect spot for those looking to soak up some sun. However, securing a cozy spot on its small stretch of sand can be quite competitive during peak season—arriving early is key!
name: Embrulho
address: Bombinhas - State of Santa Catarina, 88215-000, Brazil

name: Estaleiro
address: State of Santa Catarina, 88210-000, Brazil

detail_description: Praça Mirante das Ilhas is a stunning beach with clear waters and clean sand, making it an ideal spot for a day of relaxation. Despite the lack of nearby bars and restaurants, the beauty of this place makes it well worth a visit. The beach offers beautiful views and relatively calm waters, perfect for appreciating the allure of 4 ilhas beach.
name: Praça Mirante das Ilhas - Quatro Ilhas
address: R. Ilha das Galés - Quatro Ilhas, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

excerpt: Picturesque beach cove with views of 4 islands, plus a large cross fabled among fishermen.
name: Quatro Ilhas
address: State of Santa Catarina, 88215-000, Brazil

excerpt: Swimming & water sports such as diving & boating are popular at this scenic, rocky cove.
detail_description: Tainha Beach is a hidden gem in Bombinhas, featuring tranquil green waters and surrounded by lush vegetation, creating a picturesque setting. It's a small cove that's slightly off the beaten path, making it less crowded than other beaches in the area. Visitors can enjoy swimming and water sports like diving and boating. The beach is recommended for families and offers some small restaurants serving regional food and seafood.
name: Tainha Beach
address: Praia da Tainha, R. Cavalo Marinho - Canto Grande, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

name: Praia de Zimbros
address: Parque Natural Municipal Costeira de Zimbros s/n, Zimbros, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Praia do Conceição is a stunning beach located at the foot of Morro do Macaco, at the far end of Canto Grande de Fora. It features medium waves and a spacious sandy shoreline, making it an ideal spot for relaxation and water sports. The left side offers views of a small islet that can be easily reached on foot, providing beautiful vistas of the surrounding beaches. This beach also serves as a starting point for boat trips to other nearby beaches.
name: Praia do Conceição
address: State of Santa Catarina, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Do Ribeiro is a small and stunning beach located between Bombas and Mariscal, offering a tranquil and natural escape. Accessible from both Bombas and Bombinhas beaches, it provides an opportunity for nature appreciation without having to venture far from the city. The beach boasts transparent waters, a fantastic landscape, and the chance to encounter a natural pool with fish along the forest trail.
name: Do Ribeiro
address: State of Santa Catarina, 88215-000, Brazil

excerpt: Little beach bordered by hills & rock formations, with scenic views & adjacent eateries.
detail_description: Retiro dos Padres Beach offers a picturesque setting with hills and rocky formations, providing stunning panoramic views. Adjacent dining establishments allow for convenient access to delicious food. The beach is renowned for its captivating beauty, tranquility, and unspoiled surroundings. It also boasts well-maintained trails that are perfect for trail running enthusiasts. However, visitors should be prepared to pay a parking fee of R$ 20 due to limited space and high demand.
name: Retiro dos Padres Beach
address: State of Santa Catarina, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Trilha da Tainha is a stunning trail that offers breathtaking views of the coastline and leads to the secluded Praia da Tainha, perfect for swimming or relaxation. The 4-kilometer trail is not very difficult but requires comfortable shoes, water, and light luggage. It passes through streams in the jungle, with some rocky parts that may be challenging for inexperienced hikers. It's recommended to avoid hot times and bring sunscreen.
name: Trilha da Tainha
address: Canto Grande, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Praia de Morrinhos is a peaceful retreat for both fishermen and tourists seeking tranquility. Its calm waters make it even more serene than Praia de Bombinhas. This beach is a popular starting point for fishing boats and is frequented by families looking for relaxation amidst stunning scenery. One of its unique features is the indescribable sunset, acclaimed as the best spot to spend the evening in the municipality.
name: Praia de Morrinhos
address: Morrinhos, Bombinhas - State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

name: Triste
address: State of Santa Catarina, Brazil

detail_description: Cardoso is a collection of practically deserted beaches located from the right end of Zimbros beach. Access to these beaches is only possible through trails or by boat across the sea. The area is inside a park, well-preserved and without houses, making it an ideal place to escape from daily life. Visitors can take a cooler and enjoy the serene environment under the shade. The trail leading to Cardoso beach is not very difficult but has smooth rocks accumulating sand, creating a smoother path.
name: Cardoso
address: State of Santa Catarina, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Galheta Beach is a stunning and visually captivating destination that offers breathtaking views. It's a top spot for those seeking natural beauty and tranquility. With its picturesque surroundings, Galheta Beach is definitely worth a visit for anyone looking to experience the best of what nature has to offer.
name: Galheta Beach
address: Canto esquerdo da Praia de Bombas, Bombas, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: The Community Museum Engenho do Sertão is a must-visit for cultural enthusiasts. This unique venue combines elements of a guesthouse, museum, and community center dedicated to preserving the rich traditions of the local Acorian culture. Located in Bombinhas, it serves as a historical landmark that showcases not only the art of traditional fishing but also other local crafts like bobbin lace making and folklore performances.
name: Community Museum Engenho do Sertão
address: R. Abacate, 452 - Sertãozinho, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Capela Nossa Senhora da Imaculada Conceição is a charming place that offers serenity, tranquility, and a breathtaking panoramic vista of Bombinhas beach. This simple yet captivating chapel serves only as a spot for exploration and does not hold any religious services. Perched atop a hill, it provides visitors with an unparalleled view and an atmosphere filled with remarkable peace. Exploring this unique tourist attraction is highly recommended to truly appreciate its beauty and experience the tranquility it offers.
name: Capela Nossa Senhora da Imaculada Conceição
address: R. Cherne, s/n - Centro, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

name: Porto da Vo
address: Bombinhas - State of Santa Catarina, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: A stunning viewpoint overlooking the ocean, Mirante do Mariscal is a must-see spot in Porto. With panoramic views of the city and its coastline, visitors can take in all ofPorto's charms from this serene spot.
name: Mirante do Mariscal
address: R. Peixe Dourado, s/nº - Mariscal, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Praia da Miséria is a hidden gem nestled between Lagoinha and Sepultura beaches, only revealing itself during low tide. This charming spot is perfect for those seeking tranquility away from the crowds. With its crystal-clear waters, it's an ideal location for snorkeling and diving, allowing visitors to easily spot colorful fish and even turtles swimming by. The beach may be small in size, but it boasts stunning views that make it a photographer's paradise.
name: Praia da Miséria
address: R. Garoupas, 826 - Centro, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Located on the only path to Tainha Beach, Mirante Eco 360° e Museu de História Natural Charles Darwin offers a unique cultural tourism experience. The museum boasts an extensive collection of geological, archaeological, and terrestrial and marine animal anatomy pieces. Visitors are advised to be cautious during the climb as it can be dangerous, especially when wet.
name: Mirante Eco 360° e Museu de História Natural Charles Darwin
address: Av. Tatuíra, s/nº - Canto Grande, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Praia do Biguá is a hidden gem nestled in Bombinhas, renowned for its stunning beauty and serene atmosphere. This secluded beach can only be reached by a quick and easy trail from Sepultura Beach, making it feel like your own private paradise. The water here is refreshingly cool and crystal clear, perfect for a refreshing dip or simply soaking up the sun on the fine white sand.
name: Praia do Biguá
address: Ponta da Sepultura, Centro, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Nestled in the stunning coastal region of Bombinhas, the Piscina Natural da Sepultura is a hidden gem that offers an idyllic spot for swimming and unwinding while soaking in breathtaking ocean views. Although it may not be on every tourist's radar, this serene location is well worth the visit. A short trek leads you to this picturesque natural pool, where you can enjoy both relaxation and nature’s beauty.
name: Piscina Natural da Sepultura
address: Trilha da Praia da Sepultura, Centro, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: The "Engenho do Miminho" museum is dedicated to the history of puppetry in Brazil. It features displays about the art and techniques of puppetry, as well as examples of Brazilian puppet theatre. The museum is located in the city of Salvador, Bahia.
name: Espaço Cultural "Engenho do Miminho"
address: Final da, R. Iena, s/n - José Amândio, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of the community, Casa da Cultura Piana do Crivo is a vibrant hub that celebrates local culture and creativity. This charming venue offers a variety of activities, from engaging dance courses to captivating singing classes and crafts workshops. The space also houses a well-maintained municipal library featuring an impressive collection of Bombinense literature, making it a haven for book lovers. Additionally, visitors can enjoy sensational ballet classes and even participate in unique sieve classes!
name: Casa da Cultura Piana do Crivo
address: R. Primavera, 28 - Morrinhos, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil

detail_description: The hiking area, Cachoeira da Praia Triste, offers a serene ambiance amidst lush greenery. Visitors can relish the refreshing feel of cool water while immersing themselves in the tranquil forest surroundings. The peacefulness and beauty of this location make it akin to paradise. Additionally, its elevated position sets it apart from other destinations.
name: Cachoeira da Praia Triste
address: Praia Triste – Parque Natural Costeira de Zimbros s/n, Zimbros, Bombinhas - SC, 88215-000, Brazil
